DOC.brief_summary: The cardiorespiratory training increase muscle strength ventilatory .
DOC.detailed_description: Specifically experiment parallel factorial intervention meet eligibility criterion participant randomly allocate three group : control , respiratory training , cardiorespiratory training ( indoor Bike ) .
DOC.criteria: Have low maximal inspiratory pressure ( MIP ) maximal expiratory pressure ( MEP ) value normative reference propose Brazilian Society Thoracic . Not voluntary present study . Conditions oblige participant absent two week activity perform experiment .
